main event: On 7 July 1968, an unidentified object was reported over Southampton, New York, characterized as oval-shaped, emitting a bright bluish-white light.
interesting points: The object was observed for approximately 5 minutes before disappearing from view.,The object was estimated to be between 30-100 feet in diameter.,Witnesses included Mr. Jack Huffman and family members.,The sighting reportedly occurred around 1:15 AM under mostly clear skies.,A similar incident was reported later that year, indicating ongoing sightings in the region.
witness description: Mr. Jack Huffman, resident of Southampton, New York
